author: travelandtourworld.com
title: On the Road with David FehertyTravelandtourworld.com
text:
On the Road with David Feherty  
The Turks and Caicos is being well represented throughout North America thanks to Provo Golf Clubs sponsorship of “Feherty Off Tour”.
 
David Feherty joined PGC’s team back in May of this year as Course Ambassador, and during his 1 man very popular show, our Associate Professional Sean Wilson has been graciously giving away 4 night stays at our “beautiful, beachfront property, The Regent Grand on Grace Bay.
 
 
Sean has recently attended six live shows with Feherty in Pennsylvania and Ontario, Canada promoting the Turks & Caicos Islands and Provo Golf Club before David’s show starts. Provo Golf Club sets up a booth in the lobby of each venue prior to the show collecting email addresses from attendees to be entered in the draw for the vacation giveaway. With recently being voted the #1 island in the world by TripAdvisor, attendees have been extremely excited about the opportunity to win a free vacation and learning more about the destination. “Our timing of partnering with Feherty, one of the most popular personalities in golf, could not have come at a better time for Provo Golf Club. With interest in visiting the Turks & Caicos at an all-time high and being able to introduce the Regent Grand Resort and Provo Golf Club to David’s fans is great exposure for us and we look forward to attending 15 to 20 more shows in 2016” comments Sean.
 
Provo Golf Club is looking forward to David’s return to the islands for a quick break in October, when he takes time out of his very busy schedule to meet our members.
Source:- IAGTO
